messages.subject: "best ever" Books - 5 year old perspective
messages.msgSnippet: My daughter (Sora, 5 year old)  is into the concept of best ever .  She loves books and recently wrote a list of her best ever books.  I thought others may
messages.messageBody:
My daughter (Sora, 5 year old) is into the concept of "best ever". She loves books and recently wrote a list of her "best ever" books. I thought others may be interested in it. I bet if she wrote another list in a weeks time it would be totally different ; ))

If anyone else has a book list, I would love to see it.

Enjoy.

Tintin, Herge ("Which one?" - Mom, "Everyone!" - Sora)
Hilda and the Midnight Giant, Luke Pearson
Fritz and the Beautiful Horses, Jan Brett
Pet of the Met, Don Freeman
The Mysterious Tadpole, Steven Kellogg
Kokeshi: Kimonos, Annelore Parot
Giants Beware!, Jorge Aguirre
Zoo-ology, Joelle Jolivet
Small Saul, Ashley Spire
Zen Shorts, Jon J Muth
The Day the Goose Got Loose, Reeve Lindbergh
Binky, Ashley Spire
Every Friday, Dan Yaccarino
Amulet (1-4), Kazu Kibuishi
Art and Max, David Wiesner
Googles, Ezra Jack Keats
Pigs Aplenty, Pigs Galore!, David McPhail
The Island of the Skog, Steven Kellogg
Star Seeker: A Journey to Outer Space, Theresa Heine
Fly High, Fly Low, Don Freeman
My Neighbor Totoro (1-4), Hayao Miyazaki
The Magic Flute: The Story of Mozart's Opera, Margaret Greaves
Lorax, Dr. Seuss
Hobbit Illustrated Ed, J.R.R. Tolkien
